Welcome to our Year 3 Class Page!

We are the Courageous Captain Moores!

 

Our teacher is Mr T Venus

Our class is supported by Mrs H Kelly and Mrs E Cliffe

Our PPA Cover is provided by Mrs R Andrew

 

Our curriculum is listed below:

Long term planning cycle B Y3-4

We are so excited about this year and very happy to have everyone back in school!

The Courageous Captain Moores will be exploring all kinds of exciting things across the year and our first topic is Forces and Magnets and we will be reading The Iron Man by Ted Hughes.

To help children with the increasing level of required times tables knowledge when they get to Year 4, please make sure your child is accessing TT rock stars.

Furthermore, please make sure your child is reading at home and completing their reading diaries to earn merits.

PE this half term is on a Tuesday and Monday with Mr Venus and some amazing guests from Barnsley FC.

 

In Year 3, we are also very lucky and are given the chance to learn ukulele, as a class, each Thursday afternoon. This will start after the October half term holiday. We are also given the opportunity to showcase our talents by performing at the Metrodome, at the end of the year, alongside other schools.

Homework

The children will be given a homework to complete at the beginning of every new topic. Homework will be based on our topic but children will be able to complete it by producing anything from a Minecraft model to a poster or book. They also need to make sure that they fill out their reading logs and practice their times tables and spellings daily. Reading logs will be checked each Tuesday. If you read every day each week, you will get a merit! Spellings will be tested each Tuesday, children will be given a week to learn them. We will be using Spelling Frame to support our spellings.
